debutant: Don't spend the week before the tournament on your sofa watching TV, eating potato chips, and drinking soda or beer.
Use new, good-quality sponge and playing shoes.
Arrive at the venue with time to warm up.
Eat a light meal just before your match.

exercices_complementaires.description: Use a good-quality sponge. Practice with it.

erreurs_a_eviter: Thinking about missed shots for the rest of the match.
Constantly thinking about opponent's rating, how many points you're risking, and the score.
